channel.title: 3.6.x on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in 3.6.x on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: PortableApp version of 3.6.0v3
item.description: Added PortableApp version of 3.6.0v3. Many thanks again John. 😄

item.title: Windows XP support added back
item.description: The third version of the Windows installer for v3.6.0 has been added. This version works on XP too. 😉

item.title: Fixed windows installer for 3.6.0
item.description: The Windows installer for v3.6.0 has been fixed (was missing .dlls).

item.title: Problems with the windows installer for 3.6.0
item.description: Problems with the windows installer for 3.6.0. Took those down for today.

item.title: Version 3.6.0 released
item.description: Version 3.6.0 released. Lots of enhancements over all previous releases. You want this!
